snippet: The acquisition is TRA, a research company that observes whether television viewers actually buy the products advertised during the program.
abstract: Television analytics company TiVo is acquiring full ownership in TRA, a research company with a system that observes whether television viewers actually buy products advertised during programs.
lead_paragraph: The acquisition is TRA, a research company that observes whether television viewers actually buy the products advertised during the program.

headline.seo: TiVo to Buy TRA, Which Tracks Buying Habits of TV Viewers
headline.main: TiVo to Buy Company That Tracks Shopping of TV Viewers
headline.print_headline: TiVo to Buy Company That Tracks Shopping of TV Viewers
